Uses of Package
gui

Packages that use gui
controller Executes commands issued by the GUI, such as making changes to the model or loading and saving data. 
gui Contains the application's graphical user interface. 
model Contains the circuit model and implements logic for running the simulation. 
 

Classes in gui used by controller
Gui
          Contains the application's main window.
WireImage
          The gui part of a wire.
 

Classes in gui used by gui
ComponentDesignPane
          Displays the design of the new custom component as it is created in the NewComponentDialog.
ComponentImage
          Extends Displayable to create an abstract super class for all component images.
ComponentPin
          ComponentPin extends Displayable and is the gui representation of an input/output pin.
Displayable
          Displayable is the superclass of all logic components, input/ output pins, wires, and wire nodes.
Gui
          Contains the application's main window.
PlaceholderPin
          Represents the pin of a custom component before the component is created.
Sandbox
          Extends JComponent to provide a workspace for the visual circuit model.
WireImage
          The gui part of a wire.
WireNode
          A node on a wire (away from input/output pins) that can be dragged to change the shape of a the wire.
 

Classes in gui used by model
ComponentImage
          Extends Displayable to create an abstract super class for all component images.
Gui
          Contains the application's main window.
WireImage
          The gui part of a wire.
